# updateFocusIfNeeded()

**Instance Method**

Tells the focus engine to force a focus update immediately.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateFocusIfNeeded()
```

## Discussion

If any focus environment is currently pending an update (after calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusEnvironment/setNeedsFocusUpdate()]), then calling this method forces the focus engine to immediately update focus. Unlike [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusEnvironment/setNeedsFocusUpdate()], it does not matter if this environment currently contains focus, or if this environment is the one pending an update.

## Requesting focus update

- **setNeedsFocusUpdate()**: Submits a request to the focus engine for a focus update in this environment.
